payload.name: time-synchronization-limits-tracing-and-ordering-tolerate-skew
payload.title: Time synchronization limits tracing and ordering; tolerate skew
payload.formal: no global time; clocks drift; ordering must be logical (Lamport/HLC/vector clocks).
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2 already embeds **HLC fields** in ledger events and uses **tick-based time (HTF)** for lease expiry. That is the correct direction: avoid “wall clock as authority.” For observability and replay, bind events by sequence/causality, not timestamps.
